|  --- | --- |
|  [getDocumentScroll()](./blockly.utils_namespace.svgmath_namespace.getdocumentscroll_1_function.md) | Gets the document scroll distance as a coordinate object. Copied from Closure's goog.dom.getDocumentScroll. |
|  [getInjectionDivXY(element)](./blockly.utils_namespace.svgmath_namespace.getinjectiondivxy_1_function.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this element relative to the div Blockly was injected into. |
|  [getRelativeXY(element)](./blockly.utils_namespace.svgmath_namespace.getrelativexy_1_function.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this element relative to its parent. Only for SVG elements and children (e.g. rect, g, path). |
|  [is3dSupported()](./blockly.utils_namespace.svgmath_namespace.is3dsupported_1_function.md) | Check if 3D transforms are supported by adding an element and attempting to set the property. |
